candidates.name: Penny Smart
candidates.why_elect: Northland is home for me and a region that I care deeply about, having lived here all my life, raised a family and run a business here. I have current and previous governance experience and consider myself to be very approachable, diligent, honest and to have integrity.
candidates.why_stand: Northland's environmental sustainability and enhancement are core reasons for me standing for the Regional Council. I am also very focused on the Kaipara as I believe that there is untapped potential for economic, cultural, social and environmental development and improvement. Collaboration is key for me.
